1.name: Defense (All Troops)
1.text: Increases the defense of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

2.name: Defense (All Troops)
2.text: Increases the defense of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

3.name: Attack (All Troops)
3.text: Increases the attack of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

4.name: Call of the Pack
4.text: When the army led by this commander has been reduced to less than 50% strength, increases defense of infantry units by ${1}%

5.name: Defense Formation
5.text: When the army led by this commander has been reduced to less than 50% strength, increases defense of siege units by ${1}%

6.name: Charge
6.text: When the army led by this commander has been reduced to less than 50% strength, increases march speed of cavalry units by ${1}%

7.name: Full Quiver
7.text: When the army led by this commander has been reduced to 50% strength, increases attack of archer units by ${1}%

9.name: Health (All Troops)
9.text: Increases the health of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

10.name: Health (All Troops)
10.text: Increases the health of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

11.name: March Speed (All Troops)
11.text: Increases the march speed of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

12.name: Attack (All Troops)
12.text: Increases the attack of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

14.name: Armored To The Teeth
14.text: When armies led by this commander contain 3 or more different unit types, all damage taken is reduced by ${1}%

15.name: Defense (All Troops)
15.text: Increases the defense of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

16.name: Health (All Troops)
16.text: Increases the health of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

17.name: Armed To The Teeth
17.text: When armies led by this commander contain 3 or more different unit types, all damage dealt is increased by ${1}%

18.name: Ares' Blessing
18.text: When troops led by this commander are in battle, decreases the number of severely wounded units by ${1}% (these units will instead be slightly wounded)
